channel.title: 4.2.2 CentOS on 计算机学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 4.2.2 CentOS on 计算机学习笔记

item.title: zsh
item.description: zsh # oh-my-zsh # 安装 sudo yum install -y git zsh # sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" sh -c "$(wget https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh -O -)" cat << EOF >> ~/.zshrc export PROMPT='%{$fg[magenta]%}%(?..%?%1v)%n@%{$fg[green]%}%M:%{$fg[cyan]%}%c%{$reset_color%} $(git_prompt_info)' EOF zsh alias cdcode='cd ~/code' alias cdstudy='cdcode && cd study' alias cdtest='cdstudy && cd test' alias cdgithub='cdcode && cd github' alias cdgitlab='cdcode && cd gitlab' alias cdbitbucket='cdcode && cd bitbucket' # proxy # export http_proxy=149.28.137.166:20171 # export https_proxy=149.28.137.166:20171 # 设置默认为 zsh sudo chsh -s /usr/bin/zsh yewang
